steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Select the text that you want to apply or remove strikethrough formatting from.
To add strikethrough formatting, go to the 'Home' tab in the ribbon.
Click on the 'Strikethrough' button in the 'Font' group.
To remove strikethrough formatting, select the text with strikethrough.
Go to the 'Home' tab in the ribbon.
Click on the 'Strikethrough' button again to remove the formatting.
